s.text: A "Tangled Web" column by Slate 's Seth Stevenson traces the path of the story from Drudge, to the Internet as a whole, to television--and only then to the newspapers.
or Today's Papers, and so on.
By a fortunate coincidence, one of the world's living experts on this deeply troubling topic is the live-in husband of Slate 's Washington editor, Jodie T. Allen.
After a few Old Neukom Pale Ales, we couldn't resist asking them what they thought of this latest Clinton brouhaha.
